tool_description: This api provides analytics on Stock Prices. Stock prices are curated from Yahoo Finance; and Machine Learning is used to evaluate the stock.
name: QuoteAPI
title: QuoteAPI

api_list.name: /longterm/{symbol}
api_list.description: gets long term performance of a stock

api_list.name: /quotes/{symbol}
api_list.description: gets the quotes of the stock for the last 60 days

api_list.name: /shortterm/{symbol}
api_list.description: Gets the short term performance of a stock
